text:
I guess we have been to the best unexplored area of IIT KANPUR together on the very day we bonded...
And after that day we have been supporting each other on lows and celebrating on the highs..
And I too self introspect while talking to you, I am sure dono phodenge aage life m..
Aur ye tere maar khane ki fantasy ab kon poori kr rha..3rd year m toh jitti maar khayi hn n tune..
Ab bakchod sa placement lagwa..phir trip maarte
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
I guess almost 2 saal zero interaction k baad 3rd year start m ekdam seedhi si Anchal dikhi, and what se PR banne ki jo journey thi bdi epic rhi hn..
Bhut jiddi hn to normally bhi aur high hone k baad aur bhi jyada, but we had made good memories during Techkriti'20..

PS: Bss sab normal hote hi milte hn sab, be ready for it..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
3rd year Mid tak zero interaction tha, but Techkriti'20 m jo bonding huyi hn bhai k saath..
Kaafi acchi cheeje seekhi hn,
Bonding
Team work
Stand lena
Aur usse bhi acchi seekhayi hn, and uske baad k kaand kuch kuch toh yaad honge hi tujhe..
Team photo bhi miss ho gyi aur bhai tere saath bhi koi photo nhi hn..
Milte sab covid k baad pkka shivji ki pooja k liye..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
Pandit, Ab bccho k liye bhi Memoir likhna pdega kya..
Udghosh m hi mile the apan sayad, and we bonded kyun ki kaam ko leke dono responsible aur dedicated the and mujhe laga bda shi bnda hn, but last trip m jo over analysis kia hn tune har cheej ka..
But I must say tu logo ki jitta care krta hn, chahe kisi ko pure din raat room m bulake padhana ho* ya raat bhar kisi ko sambhalna tu expert hn bhai..
Hospi God hn waise toh tu but majdur jyada set krta tujhpe, patla sa tha par khi bhi kisi se bhi ulajh leta tha...bc phir bcche ki tarrah mujhe aur gupta ko bchake laana pdta tha..
I have known you so long and so nicely, bda sweet, caring aur responsible majdoor hn bhai tu..1000 rupaye m itti hi tareef hogi ab, baki Gin and Tonic yaad hn mujhe, next trip k liye..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
IIT Kanpur k Paanch bhaiyo m se ek bhai tha tu 1st year m jab apan sports m kuch jyada hi active rhte the, chahe mini militia ho, volleyball ho ya wing k football matches..Aur phir 2nd year m roommates ban gye, aur bc pata nhi kab poori poori raat relationship aur life k lafde discuss krne lag gye..

"I guess we both have seen each other's best and been there for each other's worst."

Love you bhai, and can't wait to meet and relive the bond we have.
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
First year m seat book krne se leke second year m ek dusre ko chapu bol bolke maje lene tak we bonded..
Baaki krni bhi dono ko majdoori thi 4 saal..
Hope to meet you soon, Chaapu..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
First year m volleyball khelne ho ya fest m bakchodi krni ho bhai saath gye har jagah.
Mota bhai toh tha hi tu phir tu majdoor bhi ban gya..uske baad toh bhai lectures, assignments, exams sab saath niptaye hn..
Bas saath trip p nhi jaa paaye..par jaldi milegi bhai aur woh bhi khtm krenge..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
Co-head se lekar 1.5 Puffiya tak we bonded,
Aur bhai company m kaam kr lio wha progress monitor hoti hn, bhane toh tu wha bhi maar hi lega..
Tosc m toh saath record tode hi the, Covid na hota toh Decor m bhi macahte bhai..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
Gupta bhai first year m presi ban gya tha tu wing ka aur jaoh tu poora time wing se baahar hi rhta tha fest and all m.. Apna interaction 2nd year  start m hua jab mujhe bhi wing se bahar nikalna tha, Udghosh..Uske baad toh bhut bakchodi kri hn har fest m saath m, kuch toh aise ki yha likh di toh degree nhi milegi..unhe rhne dete hn..
Phli Trip bhi bhai tere hi saath thi, raat ko 4 bje mood bnake next day nikal campus se nikal jaana ye  tere saath hi possible hn..Hope Aise hi job p bhi ho.
3rd year m Techkriti'20 k head bnne k baad toh uthna, baithna kya sona, hugna, nhana bhi saath hota tha.. not physically just the time frame..Bhut gaaliyan di hn ek dusre ko aur baakio ki gaand bhi khub maari hn saath m..
Fest toh nhi hua but march k mhine m jo party kri hn, jo gandh machayi thi sabne, lifetime yaad rhegi..Iss saal phir march m mile and dubara goa jaake whi bakchodi kri hn saath m...Although teri cap kaafi kam ho gyi hn ab...
Poore lockdown I guess maine tujhe jitte call kiye hn meri baaki life milake nhi kiye honge, hospi k calls hata de bss,..
Aur bhai tu hmesha mere chutiyape krne se phle hi smjh jaata hn, m phir bhi kr deta hun..woh baat alag hn..
MIlte toh apan rhenge hi...bc kuch bada krenge saath life m ye likh de rha m yha..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text: Chaapu bhai, Football se kaafi preshan kia tha tujhe 1st year m aur jyada interaction toh nhi hua apna, but hope aage acchi memories bnayege..
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
Haathi ki sbse purani memory orientation k time tug-of-war ki hn, mujhe laga ye toh akela hi keech layega but finals m jaake haar gye, still galaxy m 1st the toh football mila jisse saare din wing m khelte the and first year m sports ka jo keeda laga football, cricket, volleyball.. din ho ya lights lagne k baad raat...bss khelte rhte the..
second year se bhai civil se, same wing aur lab partner bhi  tha toh mujhe jyada kuch krna nhi pda, tere assignments aur projects p hi graduate ho rha bhai...
Hope phir kbhi volleyball/football ka match hoga, phir kbhi cycle uthake suraj se phle khi nikalenge...
author: Devendra Kumar Meel

text:
JAAN, pta nhi kab se ye roleplay start hua..
And tabse I guess ek dusre ko waise hi specially treat kr rhe with all love, care and respect.
Kaafi memories hn saath m cricket, basketball, cards, mini militia, saath me class jana aur exam ke pehle padhyi krna.. JOB ki GPL bchi huyi hn abhi teri, Jab bhi milenge fodunga...
Can't wait to meet you!!
author: Devendra Kumar Meel
